Message: The user completes the submission of the form
When I got install the pixel, on shopify Custom event test its saying its failed.

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with the pixel installation on Shopify. Let's try to resolve this together. Could you please confirm if you followed all the steps in the integration process? Here's a detailed guide on how to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). If you've followed these steps and are still encountering issues, please let me know which step is causing the problem, and I'll assist you further.
Yes still having issues after following the guide one to one.

Thanks for confirming. Since you've followed the guide and are still experiencing issues, let's try a few troubleshooting steps to ensure everything is set up correctly. Here are some things to check:
1. **Base Pixel Code**: Ensure the base pixel code is added to your landing page URL.
2. **Custom Pixel Code**: Make sure the custom pixel code is placed on the event page (where the user action takes place).
3. **Event Trigger**: Perform the action that should trigger the pixel (e.g., simulate purchasing a product if the event type is complete_payment).
4. **Shopify Configuration**: Verify that the customer event is correctly configured in Shopify.
5. **Testing**: Test the event in both Shopify and NewsBreak to ensure it triggers correctly.
If these steps don't resolve your issue, I recommend contacting our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about your setup and any error messages you're receiving.
For more detailed troubleshooting steps, you can refer to this guide: [Pixel and Postback Debugging Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23053537846669-Introduction-to-Multi-Event-Tracking).
Philip Pirrip is talking to you.
Hi Lex - If the event is a purchase event you would need to buy it in order to complete the test
